ovdesc.p: Parameter file to perform bulk updation of parent values into child. Two records SEC.OPEN.ORDER and SEC.TRADE can be created

desc.p: This field will hold list of application fields corresponding to the ID of this application.
The field entered can only be used for direct updation(e.g.,Value date,trade date and Security No) and should not involve any calculations.
Local reference fields are to be prefixed as L-.
A maximum of 21 characters may be entered
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
